title: FAB Travel Mug, Reusable Coffee Cup (510ml, Black) - Double Wall Stainless Steel with Screw Lid - Thermal Camping Cup, Vacuum Insulated for Hot and Cold Drinks, Eco-Friendly
features: ✨ FAB Reusable Travel Cup, Double wall Vacuum Insulated made from high-quality 304 food grade stainless steel with 510ml capacity to keep your drinks Hot or Cold for hours and well meet your drinking needs while you are driving or you are on the go. Sweat-free and durable with Powder Coated finish designed to resist scratch and with the screw lid achieves a better leak-proof and splash-proof effect.

✨ Our Stainless Steel Mug is an ideal portable cup for all areas of your life and can be used for variety of drinks such as coffee, tea, milkshake, juice, etc. At home, in the car or carry it along on your daily commute, to the beach, camping, hiking, outdoor sport events. It’s also an Ideal gift for families and friends. Simply fits in the car cup holder and the drinking sip hole opening are perfect for drinking without spilling.

✨ EASY TO CLEAN means that it’s perfect for daily use. Please avoid putting it into dishwasher or microwave in order to prevent damage to the thermal insulation effect. Our refillable cup will ensure a pure, clean taste that won't retain or transfer flavors. HAND WASH only for the best result!

✨ Don't put the cup upside down when it is filled with liquid. With the hot liquid please open the sip-hole on the top for a few second or so to prevent the steam from pushing the lid. Avoid shaking, especially with hot water in the cup.
✨ SUSTAINABLE alternative to disposable cups. In a world with an abundance of plastic and disposable cups, we want to offer you a better alternative with The FAB Reusable Travel Cup!
description: Product Description DOUBLE WALL INSULATION The travel mug is designed with double-wall vacuum insulation technology to keep your coffee hot for more than 4 hours and your cold beverages cold for more than 10 hours. 18/8 KITCHEN GRADE STAINLESS STEEL The vacuum-insulated travel mug is made of high-quality 304 food-grade stainless steel, which is rust-resistant, lead-free, and durable. LEAKPROOF MUG LID Drinking sip hole opening is perfect for drinking without spilling and with the screw lid achieves a better leakproof and splashproof effect. Versatile Kitchen Essential Enjoy your drink at the perfect temperature while cooking or relaxing with our secure threaded lid for effortless and safe sipping. Stay refreshed and energized during your culinary adventures. Office and School A reusable travel mug is a great way to stay hydrated during the workday or while studying. It's a sustainable choice that can save you money on bottled water while reducing your environmental impact. On-the-Go Indulgence Sometimes, you simply want to treat yourself to a delicious beverage while on the move. Our travel mug allows you to enjoy your favorite hot or cold drinks wherever you go. Driving Conveniently designed to fit most cupholders, our travel mug ensures spill-free portability for your favorite drinks on the go. No worries about finding a place to put it!
